## ciliumctl bpf auth flush

Deletes all entries for authenticated connections between identities

### Synopsis

Deletes all entries for authenticated connections between identities

```
ciliumctl bpf auth flush [flags]
```

```
  -o, --output string   json| yaml| jsonpath='{}'
```
